data_structures
Class ProductContainer

java.lang.Object
  data_structures.ProductContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProductGroup, StorageUnit
public abstract class ProductContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Author:
nRitchie An abstract class for StorageUnits and ProductGroups. These objects can "contain" Products and Items, and are referred to generically as "product containers".
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

addItem

public void addItem(Item item)
finds the productGroup with the item's product in it adds an Item to the list of items in the productGroup if there is none, it will add the product and item to itself

Parameters:
item - the item to be added

removeItem

public void removeItem(Item item)
removes and item from the container if it is not in this, but is in a subtree it will remove it from there

Parameters:
item - the item that will be removed
